nodes.text: A system of meditative exercises was practiced by the Force-sensitive species Phuii that hailed from Bardotta, around the time of the Clone Wars. Queen Julia and the Gungan Jar Jar Binks at one point practiced this form of meditation in order to discover the truth behind the disappearance of the Dagoyan Masters. With the meditation, the monarch was able to learn of the kidnapping plot, but was kipnapped herself before she could reveal it to Binks.
